featured.text: It was in response to this situation that The Carpenters’ Shop was opened in the town of Walsall, Staffordshire.
The purpose of setting up The Carpenters’ Shop was .

definition.zh_def: 木匠，專門從事木材加工和建造的工人。
definition.en_def: Workers who build and repair wooden structures and furniture.
definition.example: The carpenters worked diligently to finish the new wooden deck.
